biotools.summary: SBMLLint is a collection of tools for linting reactions. The initial focus is detecting mass balance errors. The tool takes as input a model expressed in either SBML (Systems Biology Markup Language, a standard format for biochemical models) or the Antimony language (a human readable representation of chemical reaction models).
